description: [HyperBro](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0398) can unpack and decrypt its payload prior to execution.(Citation: Trend Micro DRBControl February 2020)(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)

external_references.description: Lunghi, D. et al. (2020, February). Uncovering DRBControl. Retrieved November 12, 2021.
Lunghi, D. and Lu, K. (2021, April 9). Iron Tiger APT Updates Toolkit With Evolved SysUpdate Malware. Retrieved November 12, 2021.
